name: Drinks Adventures
description:
Drinks Adventures is a 2D  prototype platformer videogame  for PC.  At the moment is a single player game. The player's goal is rescue his family, which has been hijacked by different enemies throughout the videogame worlds.

Keyboard Controls

X - Shoot
C - Still
Space - Jump
Directionals Arrows - Move
P - Pause

Controller

X - Shoot
RB - Still
A - Jump
Joystick - Move
Start - Pause
